Title: You only need to eliminate 2 options to get to 50-50. I assume these questions are at a difficulty w...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: You only need to eliminate 2 options to get to 50-50. I assume these questions are at a difficulty where a person of that iq gets it 50-50, what else could he mean by a question of IQ 100? But that means the question should read as hard. If you have to guess it feels bad
